reviewText:
For an hour presentation, this was really great!  A brief on the best engineering feats of the time.  From the harbor of Carthage to the battle rafts used to cross elephants on a river and breaking down mountains, the prowess of this ancient civilization could have rivaled our own.

Bought as a reference tool for my friend's daughter's research project, it was an amazing one hour to behold.  Very useful information, a ton of great images on the designs and great explanations of the necessity for each invention.

I watched one episode of China and recommended this to a friend and we all were very impressed.
